approaching 2 months since the last post here :(
I've been working too many hours.
hey guys, how we doing since the coffee 'n' code session?
Gday all, Iâ€™ve been doing Free Code Camp since November. Check out my porfolio here http://wwwfreedom.github.io/FreeCodeCamp. How are you all coming along ?

I've recently discovered Free Code Camp and I'm really excited about it. I've personally wanted to increase my developer skills for a long time now and have also been looking for good platforms to help others learn web development too.

My goal from my involvement with leading the FCC Adelaide group is to not only create a helpful community around the FCC program but also create a strong more general developer community here in Adelaide - that way we can get together to share code, ideas and plans, problems and coffee and drinks!

I will lay out some more of my plans over the next coming days, but thanks to M. Arifur Rahman for inviting me to become an admin of our group and I look forward to meeting more of you in the coming months.

If you're part of the group already - how are you going with it? did you complete it? Are you stuck? Feel free to share a link to your FCC profile so we can see where everyone is up to.
